SummaryEnglish: Six childhood friends make a vow one day to become treasure hunters, and eventually grow to be the strongest heroes in the world. During his first quest, Krai Andrey realizes he isn’t cut out for the job. Even so, his friends make him their leader. Underpowered in the face of great expectations, Krai embarks on a reluctant hero’s tale of glory, headaches, and wanting to retire early.

1.TitleEnglish: Today, I Just Want to Go Home
1.SummaryEnglish: Krai Andrey is the master of the clan named First Steps. Although he would prefer to retire, he can't find an opportunity or the right time to do so. Krai explains in detail how he ended up in this situation.

2.TitleEnglish: I Want to Leave It to Tino and Take It Easy
2.SummaryEnglish: Tino has received a mission from Krai. But before she can set out, she needs a few strong members for her group. Greg, Rhuda, and Gilbert are already ready.

3.TitleEnglish: I Want to Fly Straight Through the Sky
3.SummaryEnglish: Tino and her group are fighting against a phantom even before they enter the treasure chamber. In the process, they realize that their opponent is significantly stronger than level 3. Meanwhile, Krai rushes to them to save them from their terrible fate.

4.TitleEnglish: The Mysterious Mask Wants to Fight
4.SummaryEnglish: Krai and Tino's group wander through the White Wolf's building. The group believes that Krai knows where the exit is located. However, he is clueless. Then, they suddenly encounter the survivors they were trying to rescue.

5.TitleEnglish: I Want to Leave Everything to Ark
5.SummaryEnglish: A long time ago, Sitri entrusted Krai with one of her alchemy creations: a slime powerful enough to destroy all of Zebrudia. When Krai discovers the slime is missing, he scrambles to recover it before chaos ensues.

6.TitleEnglish: I Want to Sleep Instead of Taking Charge
6.SummaryEnglish: The Akashic Tower decides on an all out war against the hunters because they falsely believe that Krai found their facility. Independent of that, Krai's careless words cause a huge group of hunters to be sent to the White Wolf's Den.

7.TitleEnglish: The Akashic Tower Wants to Experiment
7.SummaryEnglish: Sitri is finally back, but instead of focusing on the slime, she gives Krai an ominous warning. That at this rate, the entire investigation team will perish. The lethal battle between hunters and the Akashic Tower has been kicked off!

8.TitleEnglish: I Want to Rush In When It's Over
8.SummaryEnglish: Sitri saves the day. Flustered, the Akashic Tower's members ignore Sophia's orders and self-destruct. As Sitri has figured out their headquarters, the hunters press on. Flick uses his lightning spell on them all, and for a moment it seems it's all over...

9.TitleEnglish: I Want to Teach Love and Peace
9.SummaryEnglish: The hunters are faced with chimeras and a giant golem. The intense battle suddenly comes to an end when Krai arrives. The next day Noctus and the other members of the Akashic Tower are finally reunited with Sophia. But she is acting strange, and then a certain someone appears...

10.TitleEnglish: I Want to Be Renowned in the Capital
10.SummaryEnglish: The Dragon Slayer Arnold Hail is level 7 and he proudly rolls into the capital with his party "Falling Fog", but Krai doesn't even show a shred of interest. Meanwhile, getting his relics charged is causing quite commotion...

11.SummaryEnglish: The Falling Fog came to the capital to make a name for themselves, instead they get disgraced. To regain their honor, Arnold sets his sights on Krai, but he is preoccupied with how to repay his immense debt to Sitri. When chance brings them together, a fierce battle unfolds...

12.TitleEnglish: If Possible, I'd Like to Get It
12.SummaryEnglish: Krai discovers an exceptional relic that'll soon go to the auction. Since he really wants it, he contacts the seller directly. But that turns out to be Arnold, and Krai's clumsy negotiation skill backfires completely. Others people then butt in and the relic goes to the auction anyway...

13.TitleEnglish: I Want to Win the Bid No Matter What
13.SummaryEnglish: The auction has finally begun. Krai is fixated on the one relic only, but then one fun relic after the other goes up for auction. When his resolve finally breaks, bidding for the golem Akasha starts. Since Sitri has been wanting it, Krai gives up on the relic and goes all in on the golem. Who will get the mask then...?

14.TitleEnglish: I Want to Talk About My Memories
14.SummaryEnglish: After five years, Tino nostalgically recalls his first encounter with the Grieving Souls and Krai.

15.TitleEnglish: At This Rate, I'd Rather Be Somewhere Else
15.SummaryEnglish: House Gradis directly requests Krai for a job. To get out of it he goes on vacation.

16.TitleEnglish: I Want to Leave the City's Peace to You
16.SummaryEnglish: Krai enjoys his vacation, but Arnold who's in pursuit him is having the worst time.
